Text: Login Allowance ResourceDear Michael The web site address for Allowance Resource is wwwallowanceresourcecom Your login name is Your password is pass Neil Job Product Manager Environmental Data Services IHS Energy Group wwwallowanceresourcecom wwwihsenergycom

RE Login Allowance ResourceMichael Ive extended your access dthrough the end of the week Weve taken pricing feedback from the marketplace and lowered the price so that now the annual subscription price is and subscribers have the option to pay with SO allowances at current prices Also we are working on gathering information on planned scrubber installations and some other enhancements Neil Taylor Michael E To MichaelETaylor cc ENRONcom Subject RE Login Allowance Resource AM Neil Thank you for showing me your product last month I wanted to make a list of things your program offers I failed to do this bc something came up the week I had the free trial I consider your product a good product which may interest us in the future if updates are made Can I get my password temporarily activated for a day or two Another group contacted us to give us a demonstration I wanted to remember what you guys had so I had a good comparison Thanks Michael Original Message From mailto Sent Friday August PM To Taylor Michael E Subject Login Allowance Resource Dear Michael The web site address for Allowance Resource is wwwallowanceresourcecom Your login name is Your password is pass Neil
